channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Four Injured in Taichung Metro Stabbing Attack
item.description: A suspect is in police custody after a knife attack on the Taichung metro that left four injured. The attack comes exactly 10 years after a knife attack on the Taipei metro in whic

item.title: Taiwan Export Orders Rise by Nearly 11% in April
item.description: Taiwanâ€™s export orders for April were the largest in nearly two years. The economy ministry says that the value of export orders last month was around US$47.1 billion, an increase

item.title: Thousands of Dead Fish Clog Creek in Northern Taiwan
item.description: Thousands of dead fish have clogged a creek in Zhongli, northern Taiwan. Authorities say low oxygen and water levels may be to blame.

item.title: Thousands Protest Taiwan Legislature Bill To Reduce Presidential Power
item.description: Over 50 civic groups gathered outside Taiwan's legislature, with daylong protests planned opposing the Kuomintang and Taiwan People's Party's push to pass controversial reform bill
